meanings.sent1: Her obliqueness response left me confused.
meanings.sent2: The obliqueness path through the forest made it hard to follow.

meanings.definition: The quality of being slanting or inclined in direction or course.
meanings.sent1: The obliqueness of the roof allowed rainwater to drain easily.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the obliqueness of the tower as it leaned slightly to one side.
meanings.sent3: The cat's obliqueness posture while napping was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The obliqueness of the river's path created a scenic view.
meanings.sent5: The obliqueness of the hill made it challenging to climb.
